fields.name: HBO
fields.description: Home Box Office, Inc. is an American premium television network owned by Warner Bros. Discovery.

fields.name: Netflix
fields.description: Netflix is an American over-the-top content platform and production company headquartered in Los Gatos, California.

fields.name: Amazon Prime Video
fields.description: Amazon Prime Video is an American subscription video on-demand over-the-top streaming and rental service of Amazon.com, Inc., offered as a standalone service or as part of Amazon's Prime subscription.

fields.name: Disney+
fields.description: Disney+ is an American subscription video on-demand streaming service owned and operated by the Media and Entertainment Distribution division of The Walt Disney Company.

fields.name: Hulu
fields.description: Hulu is an American subscription video on-demand service fully controlled and majority-owned by The Walt Disney Company.

fields.name: CBS All Access
fields.description: CBS All Access was an American streaming video service owned and operated by CBS Interactive, a subsidiary of ViacomCBS.

fields.name: Showtime
fields.description: Showtime is an American premium television network owned by ViacomCBS through its domestic networks division.

fields.name: NBC Peacock
fields.description: Peacock is an American over-the-top subscription video on-demand streaming service owned and operated by the Television and Streaming division of NBCUniversal.

fields.name: HBO Max
fields.description: HBO Max is an American subscription video on-demand streaming service from WarnerMedia Entertainment, a division of AT&T's WarnerMedia.

fields.name: Apple TV+
fields.description: Apple TV+ is an American subscription video on-demand streaming service owned and operated by Apple Inc.
